mapper.select: SELECT friend_account.user_id AS friendId, friend_account.username AS username, friend_account.role AS role, friend_pi.first_name AS firstName, friend_pi.middle_name AS middleName, friend_pi.last_name AS lastName FROM tbl_friend_request_mst AS requests INNER JOIN tbl_personal_info_mst AS friend_pi ON requests.requestee_id = friend_pi.user_id LEFT JOIN tbl_user_mst AS friend_account ON requests.requestee_id = friend_account.user_id LEFT JOIN tbl_user_mst AS user_account ON requests.requestor_id = user_account.user_id WHERE user_account.user_id = #{userId} AND user_account.del_flag = 0 AND friend_account.del_flag = 0 AND requests.del_flag = 0
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tbl_friend_request_mst WHERE requestor_id = #{requestorId} AND requestee_id = #{requesteeId}
